name: Khon Koi (Phi Kong Koi)
shortLoreBlurb: Khon Koi (Phi Kong Koi) is a spirit from Thailand/Laos associated with one-legged ghost, jump bite. Serves as a guardian or guide across the boundary of life and death.
description: Khon Koi (Phi Kong Koi) is a spirit from Thailand/Laos associated with one-legged ghost, jump bite. Serves as a guardian or guide across the boundary of life and death.
